name: Truth'sBout
description:
A fast-paced, weighty game of True Slaughter for you and your friends!

It is very jank, but kind of fun too. 

P1 Controls:

WASD : Movement   |   Double-Tap : Dash

[F] : Fight   |   [G] : Guard

P2 Controls:

Arrows : Movement   |   Double-Tap : Dash

[ , ] : Fight   |  [ . ] : Guard

Universal:

Escape / Start : Pause

Enter / Start : Start

This game supports controllers! Use a gamepad's analog stick to play in "Hyper Mode".
